        public void renderGraph(java.lang.String action,
               java.lang.String dataPath,

        Calls out to python for rendering charts
        Parameters:
        action - the action to take
        dataPath - the path to the data
        saveFilePath - the saved file path for output of graphs

      • renderGraph

        public void renderGraph(java.lang.String action,
               java.lang.String dataPath,
               java.lang.String saveFilePath,
               int feature_width,
               int feature_height)
        Calls out to python for rendering charts
        Parameters:
        action - the action to take
        dataPath - the path to the data
        saveFilePath - the saved file path for output of graphs
        feature_width - width of feature
        feature_height - height of feature

      • graphPlotType

        public void graphPlotType(java.lang.String plotType,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> titles,
                 org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray[] matrices,
                 java.lang.String saveFilePath)
        graphPlotType sets up data to pass to scripts that render graphs
        Parameters:
        plotType - sets which plot to call whether "multi" for multiple matrices histograms, "hist" for a histogram of one matrix, or "scatter" for scatter plot
        titles - the titles of the plots
        matrices - the matrices to plot

      • plotWeightHistograms

        public void plotWeightHistograms(Layer network,
                        Gradient gradient)
        plotWeightHistograms graphs values of vBias, W, and hBias on aggregate and most recent mini-batch updates (-gradient)
        Parameters:
        network - the trained neural net model
        gradient - latest updates to weights and biases

      • plotWeightHistograms

        public void plotWeightHistograms(Layer network)

      • plotActivations

        public void plotActivations(Layer layer)
        plotActivations show how hidden neurons are used, how often on vs. off and correlation
        Parameters:
        layer - the trained neural net layer

      • renderFilter

        public void renderFilter(Layer layer,
                int patchesPerRow)
        renderFilter plot learned filter for each hidden neuron
        Parameters:
        layer - the trained neural net layer in the model

      • plotNetworkGradient

        public void plotNetworkGradient(Layer layer,
                       Gradient gradient)
        plotNetworkGradient used for debugging RBM gradients with different data visualizations
        Parameters:
        layer - the neural net layer
        gradient - latest updates to weights and biases
